sections.text:
81-1440.Law enforcement reserve officers; serve as peace officers; when; restrictions.

Subject to the restrictions set forth in subsection (2) of section 81-1438, law enforcement reserve officers shall serve as peace officers on the orders and at the discretion of the sheriff, the mayor, or the chief of police.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 782, ยง 3;Laws 2021, LB51, ยง 21.
